issue.title: [C++] Change Scanner::Head to return a RecordBatchReader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14289](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14289). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Following ARROW-9731 and ARROW-13893. This would make it more natural to work with ExecPlans that return a RecordBatchReader when you Run them. Alternatively, we could move the business to RecordBatchReader::Head.
